name: Migrator 3000 (Beta)
description: Migrate your PostHog events to a new instance.

config.hint: Use format YYYY-MM-DD e.g. 2021-10-26 = 26th October 2021. Not specifying a value will export all events.
config.name: Date to start exporting events from

config.hint: Use format YYYY-MM-DD e.g. 2021-10-26 = 26th October 2021. Not specifying a value will export all events.
config.name: Date up to which events will be exported

config.hint: Turn this on to get additional logging from the plugin
config.name: DEBUG

config.hint: The PostHog version this instance is on. Format: x.y.z. Select 'Latest' when using this in PostHog Cloud.
config.name: PostHog version
